string-array.name: program_names
string-array.item: Software Engineering Technology
Cyber Security
Web Development
Data Science
Network Administration
Artificial Intelligence
Game Development
Database Management
Mobile App Development
UX/UI Design

string-array.name: program_descriptions
string-array.item:
This 3-year course provides a comprehensive knowledge of the software field. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Java Programming
 2. Mobile Application Development
 3. Data Structures and Algorithms
 4. Software Engineering Principles
 5. Database Management

This 1-year course provides a comprehensive knowledge of the cyber field. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Cybersecurity Fundamentals
 2. Network Security
 3. Ethical Hacking
 4. Digital Forensics
 5. Security Policies and Procedures

This program focuses on web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. HTML and CSS Basics
 2. JavaScript Fundamentals
 3. Frontend Frameworks
 4. Backend Development
 5. Web Application Security

Explore the world of data through courses on statistics, machine learning, and data analysis. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Statistics and Probability
 2. Machine Learning Fundamentals
 3. Data Visualization
 4. Big Data Analytics
 5. Natural Language Processing

Learn the essentials of network administration and security practices. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Networking Fundamentals
 2. Network Configuration and Troubleshooting
 3. Network Security Principles
 4. Cloud Networking
 5. Virtualization Technologies

Dive into the field of AI with courses on machine learning and natural language processing. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
 2. Machine Learning Algorithms
 3. Neural Networks and Deep Learning
 4. Computer Vision
 5. Natural Language Processing

Create your own games with courses on game design, graphics, and programming. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Game Design Principles
 2. Graphics and Animation for Games
 3. Game Development with Unity
 4. Game Physics and Mechanics
 5. Multiplayer Game Development

Gain expertise in database management systems and SQL. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Introduction to Databases
 2. SQL Fundamentals
 3. Database Design and Modeling
 4. Advanced Database Concepts
 5. NoSQL Databases

Learn to develop mobile apps for various platforms using popular frameworks. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Mobile App Development Fundamentals
 2. Android App Development
 3. iOS App Development with Swift
 4. Cross-Platform App Development
 5. App Deployment and Distribution

Focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles. Following are some of the SEM4 courses of this program:
 
1. Introduction to UX/UI Design
 2. User Research and Usability Testing
 3. Interaction Design
 4. Visual Design Principles
 5. Prototyping and Wireframing
